Constructor Detail

ActivityEntity

public ActivityEntity(org.apache.abdera2.activities.model.ASBase base)
Create the entity using the specified Activity element. The content length will not be calculated automatically so the Content-Length header in the part will not be specified. The Content-Type will be automatically detected based on the type of element passed in.

ActivityEntity

public ActivityEntity(org.apache.abdera2.activities.model.ASBase base,
                      String contentType)
Create the entity using the specified Activity document or element. The content length will not be calculated. The Content-Type specified will be used. If contentType is null, the Content-Type will be automatically detected based on the type of element passed in.

ActivityEntity

public ActivityEntity(org.apache.abdera2.activities.model.ASBase base,
                      boolean calclen)
Create the entity using the specified Activity document or element. The content length will be automatically calculated if the calclen argument is true. The Content-Type will be automatically detected based on the type of element passed in.

ActivityEntity

public ActivityEntity(org.apache.abdera2.activities.model.ASBase base,
                      boolean calclen,
                      String contentType)
Create the entity using the specified Activity document or element. The content length will be automatically calculated if the calclen argument is true. The Content-Type specified will be used. If contentType is null, the Content-Type will be automatically detected based on the type of element passed in.
